entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few flurries and snow squalls ending near midnight then cloudy. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Clearing. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
